project.title: hr-recruitment-website
project.name: HR Recruitment Website
project.description: A web application designed to streamline the recruitment process, enabling HR teams to manage job postings, applications, interviews, and candidate profiles efficiently.

contributions.content: Developed the front-end interface for HR staff using ReactJS.
Implemented a secure login system with role-based access for administrators and hr staff.
Designed as a responsive interface to improve usability across devices.

project.title: approval-hub
project.name: RYS Approval Hub
project.description: An approval workflow system to centralize and automate the approval of internal requests, reducing processing times and improving efficiency.
project.longdescription: This system brings together all previous approval applications into one centralized platform, making it easier to manage and track requests. It's built to be flexible, allowing new applications to be added without hassle. Approvers can see and process requests from different companies based on their roles. The system is available on both mobile and desktop, ensuring accessibility across devices.

contributions.content: Designed and implemented an approval pipeline for multiple departments and multiple applications.
Designed to cater and easily add and remove applications, adjust request variables, as admin.
Easily access multiple companies requests from multiple applications.
Conducted thorough testing to ensure smooth workflow automation.

project.title: request-for-payment
project.name: Request For Payment
project.description: A payment request management system for submitting, tracking, and processing internal payment requests.
project.longdescription: Originally built for a single company, it was later redesigned to support a corporate-wide environment. This system allows staff and managers to request payments for various company-related expenses, from cash advances to notary and bill payments. Nearly all money-related requests go through this platform to ensure proper recording and tracking of transactions. It also includes a Cheque Application module, where finance staff can manage completed requests and track those requiring a cheque after approval. The system is available on both mobile and desktop for accessibility.

contributions.content: Built the back-end and front-end logic for tracking payment request statuses.
Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface with designed for submitting and monitoring requests.
Developed a notification system to alert approvers of pending requests.
Optimized database queries to ensure efficient processing of large volumes of data.

project.title: business-trip
project.name: Official Business Trip / OB and Trip Ticket QR Scanner
project.description: An organization-wide application for managing and tracking official business trips of all employees.
project.longdescription: This corporate-wide system tracks all official employee leaves and business trips. Employees can file for a business trip request, which requires approval before proceeding. Once approved, the system generates a QR code that integrates with the OB and Trip Ticket System for validation. The Trip Ticket System is designed for company drivers, ensuring proper approval and QR-based tracking for trips.

contributions.content: Developed an application that will cater to mobile and desktop, as well as implementing scanner to the application.
Designed an intuitive user interface for drivers and office staff

project.title: leave-application
project.name: RYS Leave Application
project.description: A leave management platform for employees to apply for, track, and manage their leaves with approval workflows.
project.longdescription: This application allows staff and managers to manage official leaves efficiently. Users can file leave requests, check their leave balances, and view their calendar for holidays and approved leaves. Managers, on the other hand, can review and manage leave requests from their team. The system is designed exclusively for mobile use, ensuring accessibility on the go.

contributions.content: Developed a mobile application for leave requests and approvals
Designed to be easy accessible and intuitivity-first
Integrated email and in-app notifications for leave status updates.
Implemented a calendar view for better visualization of leave schedules.

project.title: ticketing-system
project.name: Ticket System
project.description: An internal IT support ticketing system to track and resolve employee-reported technical issues.
project.longdescription: This corporate-wide system allows users to submit IT-related concerns, which can either be picked up by IT staff or assigned by the IT Manager. Once an issue is resolved, the requestor must confirm the completion and has the option to evaluate the IT staff based on responsiveness and attitude, giving a performance score. The system also tracks all responses and turnaround times, enabling performance assessment based on issue resolution efficiency.

contributions.content: Designed and developed ticket submission and tracking of it issues
Built a reporting feature to analyze ticket resolution times and trends.
Implemented a scoring system for engagement purpose and transparency.
Integrated authentication for users and support staff with role-based access.

project.title: docket-system
project.name: Docket System
project.description: A web-based application for managing and tracking email and letters, ensuring accuracy and transparency in tracking.
project.longdescription: This system was designed for a specific company and its Administration Department to efficiently track all incoming letters and mails within the organization, ensuring proper documentation and organization.

contributions.content: Developed the logic for generating and managing emails and letters.
Designed an intuitive interface for administration users, staff and managers.
Designed for easy accessibility and interchangeability of the routes.
